definitions.text: the physical magnitude of something (how big it is)
examples: a wolf is about the size of a large dog

definitions.text: the property resulting from being one of a series of graduated measurements (as of clothing)
any glutinous material used to fill pores in surfaces or to stiffen fabrics
examples: size gives body to a fabric
that's the size of the situation
she hates me, that's about the size of it
he blanched when he saw the size of the bill
the only city of any size in that area

definitions.text: cover or stiffen or glaze a porous material with size or sizing (a glutinous substance)
make to a size; bring to a suitable size
